Razor Claw bounced off Mobster, the impact made his head spin. The mighty r=
aptor heard Mobster have some smart ass comment toward him. He looked up in=
 time to see Mobster raise his weapon again. Razor Claw turned and tried to=
 run and got just far enough to avoid being hit directly by the beam. The w=
eapon still had a devastating effect on him though as the shrapnel of dirt =
and pebbles shred at his skin. The blast shot him about sixty yards from wh=
ere he'd started. He landed with an ooof as his body skipped multiple times=
 across the hard African ground. There he lay in pain, trying to regain his=
 strength and composure.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: SOULSTICE =

  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 1:53 PM
  Subj=
ect: Re: Sorry soulstice


  Mobster wobbled some, but that was the extent =
of it. He turned around.

  Mobster (Grenade voice): Are you trying to knoc=
k me over, little man?

  Mobster fires at Razorclaw once...
    ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    S=
ent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 7:54 PM
    Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


 =
   A sudden shadow covered Razor Claw as Mobsters foot raised above him. "O=
h Pit" he yelled as he turned to run. His energy was low so he didn't want =
to risk his shield not holding. He ran toward Mobster. Mobsters foot struck=
 the ground behind Razor Claw, the impact shook the ground sending Razor cl=
aw rolling past the giant gestalt. He rolled to his feat and turned again r=
eady for battle. He dove forward at Mobsters rear end hoping the giant woul=
d still be off balance enough to knock over.
      ----- Original Message -=
---- 
      From: SOULSTICE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Sund=
ay, December 24, 2000 10:46 AM
      Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


      (=
I normally am against stomping, but...)
       
      Mobster raised his fo=
ot.

      Mobster (Kracken voice): Over!

      Mobster brung his foot dow=
n towards Razorclaw...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: =
CYBERWOLF4 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Sunday, December =
24, 2000 12:11 PM
        Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


        Razor Claw=
 remained still as a statue, watching the battle rage around him. He opened=
 a comm to anyone listening. "Razor Claw to any available maximal, I'm pinn=
ed down and need some coverfire."
          ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
         From: SOULSTICE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent:=
 Saturday, December 23, 2000 1:16 PM
          Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice=



          Mobster stood still. The raptor would have to move sometime.

=
          Mobster (Horn Drill voice): He'll have to move sometime. Who help=
ed to build this house?

          Mobster kept his cannon aimed at Razorcl=
aw, waiting and watching...
            ----- Original Message ----- 
     =
       From: CYBERWOLF4 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Se=
nt: Saturday, December 23, 2000 12:48 PM
            Subject: Re: Sorry sou=
lstice


            Razor Claw knew that there was only one way to survive=
 a blast from a weapon of that size. he transformed to Raptor mode and used=
 full strength on his shield. The ground around him incinerated on contact.=
 He survived but it was sapping to much of his strength. The raptor couldn'=
t move without deactivating his shield.
              ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
              From: SOULSTICE 
              To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
              Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 10:04 AM
              Sub=
ject: Re: Sorry soulstice


              Mobster took a scratch of damage,=
 still looking down at Razorclaw. Mobster aimed his giant cannon at Razorcl=
aw and fired...
                ----- Original Message ----- 
             =
   From: CYBERWOLF4 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              =
  Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 7:01 AM
                Subject: Re: Sorr=
y soulstice


                Razor Claw stood confused for the moment, he =
tried to show no weakness. He stepped forward and hurled his sword at Mobst=
er. "Is this supposed to impress me?" he asked looking up at the bot he cha=
llenged. 
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
                 =
 From: SOULSTICE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
               =
   Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:50 AM
                  Subject: Re=
: Sorry soulstice


                  Gigas didn't move an inch, seeing as =
how Mobster was in his place now.

                  Gigas: How about this,=
 I crush you, as Mobster, I crush you, as Gigas, it'll work 2 ways.

      =
            Mobster switches voices.

                  Kracken: But right =
now, we're Mobster...
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
                 From: CYBERWOLF4 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
                    Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:15 AM
        =
            Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                    Razor Claw l=
ooked up at his attacker still showing no fear, "That sounds like a challen=
ge, Let's make this interesting, you knock me down, I join your alliance, I=
 knock you down, you surrender to the Maximals, deal?" he stepped forward, =
pulled his left arm back and threw an upprcut into Gigas' stomach. "I'll go=
 first."
                      ----- Original Message ----- 
              =
        From: SOULSTICE 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    =
                  Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 12:18 PM
             =
         Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                      Gigas: Oh, ho=
hohohoho, I love an unfair fight. That wasn't my best shot, but I didn't wa=
nt to waste anything on you. In other words, I am not intimidated. I have s=
een battles come and go, me taking the brunt of the attack, but i still sta=
nd, I still walk, I still fight. You know, you should join the Alliance, it=
 would do you a world of good.

                      Gigas stayed planted =
to his spot, not moving an inch...
                        ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
                        From: CYBERWOLF4 
                   =
     To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                        Sent: Wednesday, Decem=
ber 20, 2000 10:20 AM
                        Subject: Sorry soulstice


  =
                      Sorry, it must've been mixxed up in the battle. I fou=
nd it.

                        claw struck him, but Gigas didn't move. Beh=
older 2 and Grenade are both bowled over by the energy ball. Horn Drill jum=
ps in the air and backflips, happy that he again came through for the Mini-=
Mafia. Gigas looks down at Razorclaw. (Judging by the size of the Razorclaw=
 figure and the fact that Gigas is a large, Ultra sized bot, like Depth Cha=
rge) Gigas swings a huge punch at Razorclaw

                        Razor =
Claws head snapped back from Gigas' punch.  The punch hurt like hell but Ra=
zor Claw wouldn't show pain. The impact caused the Raptor to be knocked bac=
k about ten feet but he stayed on his feat. He looked back  at the attacker=
 and couldn't hold back a snarl. "I hope that wasn't your best shot, I'd ha=
te to have to eliminate you in an unfair fight".
                          =
----- Original Message ----- 
                          From: THECODE 
    =
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                          Sen=
t: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 6:13 PM
                          Subject: Re=
: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three should get help.


      =
                    OOC: Hey, Gigas punched at Razorclaw, post damage...
  =
                          ----- Original Message ----- 
                   =
         From: CYBERWOLF4 
                            To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
                            Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 10:31 AM
 =
                           Subject: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe t=
he three should get help.


                            Razor Claw saw the =
three bots leaving the sceen of the battle and mistook them for escaping al=
liance members. he mentally reported his actions to Ice and got the go ahea=
d. He chased the three until they were out of the way of the fight. He tran=
sformed to robot mode, pulled his sword and confronted them. "You will stop=
 or you will be forced to, your choice."

                            He ap=
roached the three bots ready for battle and hoping that things won't be end=
ed peacefully.
                              ----- Original Message ----- 
=
                              From: dachande 
                             =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                              Sent: Monday, Decemb=
er 18, 2000 7:40 PM
                              Subject: Eclipse, Wolveri=
tron, and Ramus


                              ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus=
::
                               
                                  They h=
ad heard the battling and decided to run away, they needed no part in the c=
onflict. Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they were leaving, and t=
ogther they exited the base, in beast modes. And headed far away.









=













        eGroups Sponsor
